tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_storage (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    system_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    storage_capacity DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    efficiency FLOAT NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyConsumption (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    system_id INT,
    consumed_energy DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (system_id) REFERENCES EnergyStorageSystems(id)
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyProduction (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    system_id INT,
    produced_energy DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (system_id) REFERENCES EnergyStorageSystems(id)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_storage_systems (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    type VARCHAR(50),
    capacity DECIMAL,
    location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    system_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    consumption DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE energy_production (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    system_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    production DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE energy_optimization (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    optimization_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    optimization_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE EnergyStorageSystems (
  id INT NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  capacity DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  efficiency DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyConsumption (
  id INT NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  system_id INT NOT NULL,
  energy_consumed DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (id),
  FOREIGN KEY (system_id) REFERENCES EnergyStorageSystems(id)
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyProduction (
  id INT NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  system_id INT NOT NULL,
  energy_produced DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (id),
  FOREIGN KEY (system_id) REFERENCES EnergyStorageSystems(id)
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
  id INT NOT NULL,
  system_id INT NOT NULL,
  log_description TEXT,
  log_date DATE NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (id),
  FOREIGN KEY (system_id) REFERENCES EnergyStorageSystems(id)
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyOptimization (
  id INT NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  system_id INT NOT NULL,
  optimization_metric DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (id),
  FOREIGN KEY (system_id) REFERENCES EnergyStorageSystems(id)
);
